019
020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer;
021
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023
024import java.lang.reflect.Type;
025import java.lang.reflect.WildcardType;
026import java.util.List;
027
028import org.apiguardian.api.API;
029import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
030import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.WildcardTypeNameImpl;
031
032/**
033 *  The specialisation of
034 *  {@link TypeName}
035 *  for wildcard named types.
036 *
037 *  @author Square,Inc.
038 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
039 *  @version $Id: WildcardTypeName.java 1085 2024-01-05 16:23:28Z tquadrat $
040 *  @since 0.0.5
041 *
042 *  @UMLGraph.link
043 */
044@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: WildcardTypeName.java 1085 2024-01-05 16:23:28Z tquadrat $" )
045@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
046public sealed interface WildcardTypeName extends TypeName
047    permits WildcardTypeNameImpl
048{
049        /*---------*\
050    ====** Methods **==========================================================
051        \*---------*/
052    /**
053     *  {@inheritDoc}
054     */
055    @Override
056    public WildcardTypeName annotated( final List<AnnotationSpec> annotations );
057
058    /**
059     *  Returns an instance of
060     *  {@link TypeName}
061     *  for the given type mirror.
062     *
063     *  @param  mirror  The type mirror for a wildcard type.
064     *  @return The respective {@code TypeName} instance.
065     */
066    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
067    public static TypeName from( final javax.lang.model.type.WildcardType mirror )
068    {
069        final var retValue = WildcardTypeNameImpl.from( mirror );
070
071        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
072        return retValue;
073    }   //  from()
074
075    /**
076     *  Returns an instance of
077     *  {@link TypeName}
078     *  for the given wildcard type.
079     *
080     *  @param  wildcardName    The wildcard type.
081     *  @return The respective {@code TypeName} instance.
082     */
083    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
084    public static TypeName from( final WildcardType wildcardName )
085    {
086        final var retValue = WildcardTypeNameImpl.from( wildcardName );
087
088        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
089        return retValue;
090    }   //  from()
091
092    /**
093     *  Returns a subtype for the given type.
094     *
095     *  @param  type    The type.
096     *  @return The subtype.
097     */
098    @SuppressWarnings( "ClassReferencesSubclass" )
099    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
100    public static WildcardTypeName subtypeOf( final Type type )
101    {
102        final var retValue = WildcardTypeNameImpl.subtypeOf( type );
103
104        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
105        return retValue;
106    }   //  subtypeOf()
107
108    /**
109     *  Returns a type that represents an unknown type that extends the given
110     *  type. For example, if {@code type} is
111     *  {@link CharSequence CharSequence.class},
112     *  this returns {@code ? extends CharSequence}. If {@code type} is
113     *  {@link Object Object.class},
114     *  this returns {@code ?}, which is shorthand for
115     *  {@code ? extends Object}.
116     *
117     *  @param  type    The type.
118     *  @return The subtype.
119     */
120    @SuppressWarnings( "ClassReferencesSubclass" )
121    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
122    public static WildcardTypeName subtypeOf( final TypeName type )
123    {
124        final var retValue = WildcardTypeNameImpl.subtypeOf( type );
125
126        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
127        return retValue;
128    }   //  subtypeOf()
129
130    /**
131     *  Returns a super type for the given type.
132     *
133     *  @param  type    The type.
134     *  @return The super type.
135     */
136    @SuppressWarnings( "ClassReferencesSubclass" )
137    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
138    public static WildcardTypeName supertypeOf( final Type type )
139    {
140        final var retValue = WildcardTypeNameImpl.supertypeOf( type );
141
142        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
143        return retValue;
144    }   //  supertypeOf()
145
146    /**
147     *  Returns a type that represents an unknown supertype of the given type.
148     *  For example, if {@code type} is
149     *  {@link String String.class},
150     *  this returns {@code ? super String}.
151     *
152     *  @param  type    The type.
153     *  @return The super type.
154     */
155    @SuppressWarnings( "ClassReferencesSubclass" )
156    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
157    public static WildcardTypeName supertypeOf( final TypeName type )
158    {
159        final var retValue = WildcardTypeNameImpl.supertypeOf( type );
160
161        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
162        return retValue;
163    }   //  supertypeOf()
164
165    /**
166     *  {@inheritDoc}
167     */
168    @Override
169    public WildcardTypeName withoutAnnotations();
170}
171//  interface WildcardTypeName
172
173/*
174 *  End of File
175 */
